item.warpwing.burning_wing.burnt: §4The fire has been extinguished but the wing was irreparably damaged...
item.warpwing.burning_wing.tooltip: §4It burns! Put it out, the wing won't last long
item.warpwing.burnt_wing.tooltip: §9Charge to warp home. The wing has been burnt, it won't last long...
item.warpwing.burnt_wing.teleporting: §9The wing guides you home but broke
